channel.title: Sabayon Linux Online Repository Status
channel.description: Keep you updated on what's going on in the Sabayon Linux Repository.

item.description: Simple screen locker utility for X, fork of sflock, which is based on slock. Main difference is that sxlock uses PAM authentication, so no suid is needed.
item.title: [3] x11-misc/sxlock-1.1~0

item.description: Use external locker as X screen saver
